long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steal Ball Run is an action packed capture the flag style experience in which two local players must fight to prove one's martial might.

Controls:
     Player 1:
          WASD - Movement
          E (hold and release) - Shoot

     Player 2:
          Arrow Keys - Movement
          / (hold and release) - Shoot

Source code: https://github.com/AssMonke/Stea-Ball-Run
